str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Cowardly, timid, fearful. From deos; timid, i.e. faithless.
And, even, also, namely.
(passively) untrustworthy (person), or incredible (thing).
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Dative Masculine Plural
str2: To abhor, detest, loathe. From a derivative of bdeo; to be disgusted, i.e. detest.
And, even, also, namely.
A murderer.
And, even, also, namely.
A fornicator, man who prostitutes himself. From pernemi; a prostitute, i.e. a debauchee.
And, even, also, namely.
A magician, sorcerer. The same as pharmakeus.
And, even, also, namely.
A server (worshipper) of an image (an idol). From eidolon and the base of latreuo; an image- worshipper.
And, even, also, namely.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
False, deceitful, lying, untrue. From pseudomai; untrue, i.e. Erroneous, deceitful, wicked.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A part, portion, share. From an obsolete but more primary form of meiromai; a division or share.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A lake. Probably from limen; a pond.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Dative Feminine Singular
str2: To ignite, light, burn, lit. and met; I consume with fire. Apparently a primary verb; to set on fire, i.e. Kindle or consume.
Fire; the heat of the sun, lightning; fig: strife, trials; the eternal fire. A primary word; 'fire'.
And, even, also, namely.
Brimstone, sulfur. Probably neuter of theios; sulphur.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Second; with the article: in the second place, for the second time. As the compare of duo; second.
Death, physical or spiritual. From thnesko; death.
